Subject: Run away to fight another day
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
From: RoboRick007 <rfa007@...>

::Hot Rod::

He looks up, only to see a lot of weapons fire cvoming at him. He makes
a giant leap avoiding all but a few laser shots. He transformes to car
mode in the air, and lands on his wheels. He then takes off at close to
100MPH and climbing. He was headed for the other Maximals.
